verses.verse: Paul <S%G2822>called<s%> to be an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G4988>Sosthenes<s%> our <S%G80>brother,<s%>

To the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2882>Corinth,<s%> to them that are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> to be <S%G40>saints,<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> that in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G1941>call<s%> on the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> their's and <S%G2257>our's:<s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be to you, and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

I <S%G2168>thank<s%> my <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>on<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4012>behalf,<s%> for the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> you by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>
That in <S%G3956>every<s%> thing you are <S%G4148>enriched<s%> by him, in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3056>utterance,<s%> and in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge;<s%>
<S%G2531>Even<s%> as the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was <S%G950>confirmed<s%> in you:

<S%G5620>So<s%> that you <S%G5302>come<s%> <S%G5302>behind<s%> in <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G5486>gift;<s%> <S%G553>waiting<s%> for the <S%G602>coming<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G950>confirm<s%> you to the <S%G5056>end,<s%> that you may be <S%G410>blameless<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful,<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> you were <S%G2564>called<s%> to the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of his <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> by the <S%G3686>name<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> that you <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3004>speak<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> thing, and that there be <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4978>divisions<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you; but that you be <S%G2675>perfectly<s%> <S%G2675>joined<s%> <S%G2675>together<s%> in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%> and in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1106>judgment.<s%>
For it has been <S%G1213>declared<s%> to me of you, my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> by them which are of the house of <S%G5514>Chloe,<s%> that there are <S%G2054>contentions<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> that <S%G1538>every<s%> one of you <S%G3004>said,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> of Paul; and I of <S%G625>Apollos;<s%> and I of <S%G2786>Cephas;<s%> and I of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
Is <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3307>divided?<s%> was Paul <S%G4717>crucified<s%> for you? <S%G2228>or<s%> were you <S%G907>baptized<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of Paul?
I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> that I <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of you, but <S%G2921>Crispus<s%> and <S%G1050>Gaius;<s%>
<S%G2443>Lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3387>any<s%> should <S%G2036>say<s%> that I had <S%G907>baptized<s%> in <S%G1699>my<s%> own <S%G3686>name.<s%>

And I <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G3624>household<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas:<s%> <S%G3063>besides,<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G1487>whether<s%> I <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G243>other.<s%>

For <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> me not to <S%G907>baptize,<s%> but to <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel:<s%> not with <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G3056>words,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> should be <S%G2758>made<s%> of <S%G2758>none<s%> <S%G2758>effect.<s%>

For the <S%G3056>preaching<s%> of the <S%G4716>cross<s%> is to them that <S%G622>perish<s%> <S%G3472>foolishness;<s%> but to us which are <S%G4982>saved<s%> it is the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> I will <S%G622>destroy<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of the <S%G4680>wise,<s%> and will <S%G114>bring<s%> to <S%G114>nothing<s%> the <S%G4907>understanding<s%> of the <S%G4908>prudent.<s%>

<S%G4226>Where<s%> is the <S%G4680>wise?<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> is the <S%G1122>scribe?<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> is the <S%G4804>disputer<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world?<s%> has not <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3471>made<s%> <S%G3471>foolish<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world?<s%>

For <S%G1894>after<s%> that in the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> by <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> not <S%G2316>God,<s%> it <S%G2106>pleased<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> by the <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> of <S%G2782>preaching<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> them that <S%G4100>believe.<s%>
For the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G154>require<s%> a <S%G4592>sign,<s%> and the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> after <S%G4678>wisdom:<s%>
But we <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4717>crucified,<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> a stumbling <S%G4625>block,<s%> and to the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G3472>foolishness;<s%>

But to them <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G2822>called,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and <S%G1672>Greeks,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3754>Because<s%> the <S%G3474>foolishness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G4680>wiser<s%> than <S%G444>men;<s%> and the <S%G772>weakness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2478>stronger<s%> than <S%G444>men.<s%>

For you <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2821>calling,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> how that not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> men <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1415>mighty,<s%> not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2104>noble,<s%> are called:

But <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1586>chosen<s%> the <S%G3474>foolish<s%> things of the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G2617>confound<s%> the <S%G4680>wise;<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1586>chosen<s%> the <S%G772>weak<s%> things of the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G2617>confound<s%> the things which are <S%G2478>mighty;<s%>

And <S%G36>base<s%> things of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and things which are <S%G1848>despised,<s%> has <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1586>chosen,<s%> yes, and things <S%G3588>which<s%> are not, to <S%G2673>bring<s%> to <S%G2673>nothing<s%> things that are:
That <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> should <S%G2744>glory<s%> in his <S%G1799>presence.<s%>

But of him are you in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1096>made<s%> to us <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> and <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> and <S%G38>sanctification,<s%> and <S%G629>redemption:<s%>
That, <S%G2531>according<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> He that <S%G2744>glories,<s%> let him <S%G2744>glory<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
